data.title: How to Become a Police Officer
data.text:
Police Officer Trainee

September 2024 Testing Dates

Open: Monday, July 15, 2024

Close: Thursday, August 22, 2024

Written Examination:

· Wednesday, September 4, 2024 – Local Candidates: Santa Monica Institute (SMI), 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM

· Saturday, September 7, 2024 – Local Candidates: Santa Monica Institute (SMI), 9:00 AM, 11:00 AM

· Sunday, September 8, 2024 – Out of State/Out of Area Candidates: Santa Monica Institute (SMI), 9:00 AM

Physical Fitness Qualifier:

· Sunday, September 8, 2024 – Out of State/Out of Area Candidates: Santa Monica High School 1:00 PM

· Sunday, September 15, 2024 – Local Candidates: Santa Monica High School; Times: 9:00 AM, 11:00 AM

Oral Interview:

· Monday, September 9, 2024 – Out of State/Out of Area Candidates: Public Safety Facility, Morning schedule – to be concluded by 12 Noon

· Thursday, September 19, 2024 – Local Candidates: Public Safety Facility, 7:30 AM – 12:00 PM (subject to change)

Training and Preparation Class (TAPS)

None Scheduled

Police Officer Trainee
